verses.verse: Go <S%G33>to<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> ye rich <S%G4145>men,<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3649>howl<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5004>miseries<s%> that shall come <S%G1904>upon<s%> you.
Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> are <S%G4595>corrupted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> <S%G4598>motheaten.<s%>

Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G696>silver<s%> is <S%G2728>cankered;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2447>rust<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>a<s%> <S%G3142>witness<s%> against <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%> Ye have heaped treasure <S%G2343>together<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3408>hire<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> who have reaped <S%G270>down<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5561>fields,<s%> which is <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> kept back by <S%G650>fraud,<s%> <S%G2896>crieth:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G994>cries<s%> of them which have <S%G2325>reaped<s%> are <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>Sabaoth.<s%>

Ye have lived in <S%G5171>pleasure<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> been <S%G4684>wanton;<s%> ye have <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> as <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4967>slaughter.<s%>
Ye have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> and <S%G5407>killed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1342>just;<s%> and he doth <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G498>resist<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

Be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1092>husbandman<s%> waiteth <S%G1551>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hath long <S%G3114>patience<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4406>early<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3797>latter<s%> <S%G5205>rain.<s%>

Be ye also <S%G3114>patient;<s%> <S%G5210><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> draweth <S%G1448>nigh.<s%>

Grudge <S%G4727><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> one against <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye be <S%G2632>condemned:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2374>door.<s%>

Take, <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for an <S%G5262>example<s%> of suffering <S%G2552>affliction,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3115>patience.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we count them <S%G3106>happy<s%> which <S%G5278>endure.<s%> Ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2492>Job,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> very <S%G4184>pitiful,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of tender <S%G3629>mercy.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G243>any<s%> <S%G5100>other<s%> <S%G3727>oath:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3483>yea<s%> <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G3483>yea;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3756>nay,<s%> <S%G3756>nay;<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5272>condemnation.<s%>
Is any among you <S%G2553>afflicted?<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5213><s%> let him <S%G4336>pray.<s%> Is any <S%G2114>merry?<s%> <S%G5100><s%> let him sing <S%G5567>psalms.<s%>

Is any <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%> let him call <S%G4341>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let them <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G218>anointing<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2171>prayer<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2577>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall raise him <S%G1453>up;<s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2579>if<s%> he <S%G5600>have<s%> <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> they shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Confess <S%G1843><s%> your <S%G3900>faults<s%> one to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2172>pray<s%> one for <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> ye may be <S%G2390>healed.<s%> The effectual <S%G1754>fervent<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of a righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G2480>availeth<s%> <S%G4183>much.<s%>

Elijah <S%G2243><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> subject to like <S%G3663>passions<s%> as <S%G2254>we<s%> are, <S%G2532>and<s%> he prayed <S%G4336>earnestly<s%> <S%G4335><s%> that it might <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1026>rain:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1026>rained<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> by the space of <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1763>years<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G5205>rain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> brought <S%G985>forth<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> do <S%G4105>err<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1994>convert<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%>

Let him <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he which <S%G1994>converteth<s%> the <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2572>hide<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
